summary: This mod adds a Kingdom Key to the game :D
descriptionHtml:
-If you are a Kingdom Hearts fan (like me :D) I bet you looked for a Keyblade mod before. I did too, and I couldn't find nothing in the Nexus, until I found out the Moar Kontent mod(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9700/?) had a keyblade. I HAVE NOT MADE THIS TEXTURES OR THE MODEL, I ONLY MADE A STANDALONE VERSION, THE TEXTURES AND MODEL OF THIS MOD WERE MADE BY MUNCHA, CREATOR OF THE MOAR KONTENT MOD.

-To get it, go to any forge and look for it in Daedric, the recipe is:
4 x Gold ingots
8 x Silver Ingots

-Take a look to the Moar Kontent mod if you want more information. If there's any error with the textures or something, tell me, but I'm new modding, so I'd BE VERY GRATEFUL if someone helps me solving problems

-To Install, drag the files of the .rar in your data folder
To uninstall, delete the files or disable it at the Skyrim launcher.


Hola, Diego :3
author: NyahBinghiman

files.name: Improved Keyblade with the silver sword enchantment
